name: Inukari - Fateful detour
description:
Inukari's path led her into the big City of mankind to beat a terrible evil.
Now its time to travel back where she belong. In her beloved forest and to her shrine.
On her way she will pass through absurd and even cruel situation.
Its a path of a fateful detour.

Help the little spirit to find her way back home.





Features

  • Charming Retro-Pixel
  • 2 worlds with each 10 levels
  • Fast gameplay with accurate control
  • upbeat 8-bit soundtrack ones again by Nakanoi
  • Local Muliplayer Mode - Battle Mode
